subject: Re: rsync port down in ftp.debian.org
body:
On Mon, Jun 04, 2007 at 04:11:10PM -0300, Carlos Carvalho wrote:
>  >   You can probably ask to get access to master.debian.org
> 
> Really??? Josip asked in debian-admin a few times for ftp.br.d.o to
> get access to master, with tests showing difference in bandwidth
> relative to other mirrors. He was completely ignored...

Gosh, I forgot about that, and it was on April 8th...
I filed it as a RT ticket now.

-- 
     2. That which causes joy or happiness.


--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
